name: Earthsense
summary: Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble.
description:
Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble. You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.Traits

Oread: Oreads are planar scions descended from shaitans.
